titleStmt.title: The speech of the late Lord Russel to the sheriffs together with the paper deliver'd by him to them at the place of execution, on July 21, 1683.
titleStmt.author: Russell, William, Lord, 1639-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Darby by direction of the Lady Russel,

notesStmt.note: One of at least two editions printed in the same year, with the same title and "for John Darby" in colophon, but from different sets of type.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
